title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.
author: Jen Lennon

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: Casting News: Andor Subs In for Kimmel, Connie Britton Joins Steve Carell Comedy and More
description: Jimmy Kimmel is about to embark on his annual summer vacation — and ABC has enlisted a rebel spy to fill in as host. Diego Luna will preside over Jimmy Kimmel Live! the week of Monday, June 23. According to Deadline, the Andor star’s guests will include Adria Arjona, Ariela Barer, David Corenswet, Nicholas Hoult, […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Bad Monkey EP Bill Lawrence Offers Season 2 Update, Confirms ‘Razor Girl’ Adaptation On Hold in Favor of New Story With Same Cast
description: Eight months after Bad Monkey’s Season 1 finale, and six months after the Vince Vaughn-led detective comedy was renewed at Apple TV+, executive producer Bill Lawrence tells TVLine that writing on Season 2 is nearly complete, and cameras will officially start rolling this fall. “They’re almost done in the writers’ room,” the EP says. “We […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
